summary: 7. what character surprised you the most this year?
question: 7. what character surprised you the most this year?
answer:
It’s gotta be TJ. His whole arc with Cyrus began this year and he changed so much since the days of being rude to Buffy and I honestly couldn’t have guessed that TJ would end up where he is now from the episodes before he met Cyrus.

Genuinely become one of my favourite characters I love him 🥰

tags: sorry if this came off as rude
but I felt like this had to be explained
summary: PLEASE do some Jyrus related things like you did with Tyrus 😔 We get left out of so many things and it’s actually really...
question: PLEASE do some Jyrus related things like you did with Tyrus 😔 We get left out of so many things and it’s actually really upsetting
answer:
uhhh I just put whatever I feel like on my blog? because it’s not a service? it’s literally just anything I want? and I don’t really ship jyrus sooo? chances are my blog isn’t the right place to find what you’re looking for

and I’m sorry you’re feeling “left out”, but blogs don’t operate to please the masses, so to say. No one is obligated to make content for any ship they’d prefer not to, and frankly, no one is obligated to make content at all. Blogs aren’t people’s jobs (outside of artists and others who commission), and therefore nothing anyone posts has to be for the benefit of the “audience” or whatever. If people like what I post, great! If some don’t, also cool! 

Anyway, in conclusion, you’re not being left out. It’s just that the people who enjoy that ship have stopped making a lot of content for it, which can suck. But you’re also someone who enjoys it! The power is in your hands, my dude! Just don’t go to someone’s blog ask for content you were never entitled to and stuff. Hope you’re able to find what you’re looking for somewhere else!

summary: Three and five for the AM asks?
question: Three and five for the AM asks?
answer:
3. favorite fic(s) that you read this year?

Ooh this is a tough one!

I absolutely adored That Damned Universe by @im-trash-bye! It was so well written and I loved all of the detail that was put into it!

I also loved Swap! by @admirablyamber! I love the style of it, and the premise of the fic! I am constantly excited for new chapters!!

5. how do you think the ghc celebrates new years?

I have always headcanoned that they have a huge sleepover at Cece’s! The GHC is there, plus Jonah, Marty, Walker, Tj, and Amber. They all bring boardgames and play them all night. They put a new years show on the tv, and drink sparkling grape cider. At midnight, they all do a group hug, though in the later years of the tradition, they started pairing off with their boyfriend/girlfriend and kissing at midnight. Cece never approved of the kissing.

summary: Tj
question: Tj
answer:
• just posted this, but he’s terrified of spiders
  • this is pretty common but he’s a HUGE history nerd
  • he’s got a single dad (and his mom died/left them) bc i feel like that would explain a lot idk
  • he thinks he has a shitty singing voice but he’s actually rlly good
  • he had a treehouse in his backyard when he was little, he doesn’t go up there anymore but he’ll still occasionally look at it through his window and remember what things used to be like
  • he s u c k s at ice skating, it’s one of the things cyrus teaches him how to do
  • he actually has more button downs than hoodies, he just never wears them

summary: Hi. Can you share your theories of what you think will happen in AM?
question: Hi. Can you share your theories of what you think will happen in AM?
answer:
this is gonna be pretty long so prepare yourselves. also i’m on mobile so i can’t add a read more or anything.
canonically, i have pretty much the same theories as everybody else. tyrus, muffy, bexie, and (maybe) jandi will most likely be the endgame ships.
i personally don’t want jandi to be endgame because i feel like those two characters really need that character development of getting over each other.
tyrus and bexie are the ones i’m pretty much 100% certain will be endgame. they both have so much potential and if they weren’t endgame i would honestly just be confused, especially if bexie wasn’t endgame.
muffy i’d absolutely love to see be romantically endgame, and i’m pretty sure they will be, but i’d also be okay if they just went back to their friendship dynamic from season 1 and early season 2.
i think amber and andi will become better friends and hang out more, unless something really bad happens that breaks them up in 3x8. i hope we get more scenes of our disaster gays amber and cyrus together too, and buffy and amber can become friends too.
as much as i want kippen siblings to become canon, i don’t think it will. i’m not completely debunking it, but i don’t think it will become canon. i do for sure want some type of amber/tj interaction sometime this season.
speaking of people interacting with tj, i think that buffy and tj will become better friends, especially through basketball. they’ll learn to work together more and act more like friends. i think andi and tj will somewhat become friends at one point, and she won’t hate him too much because of the whole gun thing.
now for jonah. i think his relationships with everybody will grow this season, and we’ll finally be able to learn more about him as a person and his home and family life. i think he and tj will work through whatever he’s upset about in the 3x8 promo, and they’ll be able to become friends.
i know cyrus’ sexuality storyline is going to be explored more this season. i think he will somehow come out to jonah, and maybe even (hopefully) to his family. i’ve really loved his relationship with bex so far in the show, and i would love to see a coming out scene between them since their relationship is so pure.
i want iris to come back, and i think she might. idk how, but i just want her to come back. even if it’s just for a little cameo or something, i want to see iris again in the show.
i definitely have more theories and stuff, but these are pretty much my main ones :)

as much as i want kippen siblings to become canon, i don’t think it will. i’m not completely debunking it, but i don’t think it will become canon. i do for sure want some type of amber/tj interaction sometime this season.
speaking of people interacting with tj, i think that buffy and tj will become better friends, especially through basketball. they’ll learn to work together more and act more like friends. i think andi and tj will somewhat become friends at one point, and she won’t hate him too much because of the whole gun thing.
now for jonah. i think his relationships with everybody will grow this season, and we’ll finally be able to learn more about him as a person and his home and family life. i think he and tj will work through whatever he’s upset about in the 3x8 promo, and they’ll be able to become friends.
i know cyrus’ sexuality storyline is going to be explored more this season. i think he will somehow come out to jonah, and maybe even (hopefully) to his family. i’ve really loved his relationship with bex so far in the show, and i would love to see a coming out scene between them since their relationship is so pure.
i want iris to come back, and i think she might. idk how, but i just want her to come back. even if it’s just for a little cameo or something, i want to see iris again in the show.
i definitely have more theories and stuff, but these are pretty much my main ones :)

TJ Kippen and Tyrus Stan | The AM cast deserves the world

Can rant for days and prone to tangents | Come interact I like new friends

tags: i prob have more my friends and i come up with but i just
brain dumped a few here lol
idk if that was too much or too little but :))
summary: Best TJ hcs!
question: Best TJ hcs!
answer:
OOOO THESE ARE FUN

  • He’s actually pretty decent with all other subjects but math, and really likes and is good at History
  • TJ’s a naturally touchy person but only processes once he gets home. Like his actions hit him out of nowhere, he could be on his computer and suddenly get embarassed over everytime he touched Cyrus that day like
  • “OH MY GOD I TAPPED HIS CHEST AGAIN WHY DO I KEEP DOING THAT HE DOESNT SEEM TO HAVE AN ISSUE WITH IT BUT AHHHHH”
  • He’s the type of person who regularly does things like dab and say things like its ya boi and YEET because he’s a walking meme
  • He wears glasses at home
  • He knows Marty’s name but never bothered to use it because he never felt the need to
  • He gives Buffy tips and training exercises to run the girls basketball team
  • When he texts he’s really expressionable and makes weird faces at his phone like if he’s sending a grumpy message he pouts in public or if he’s sending a “what” his eyebrows are drawn
  • And when he texts Cyrus he has the dumbest smile on
  • He’s a scorpio and thinks all the astrology stuff is hullabaloo but reads them anyway
  • He’s a closeted weeb and internally cringes whenever he hears someone bash on anime
  • He’s really tempted to say “I’VE GOT THE POWER OF GOD AND ANIME ON MY SIDE” at least once
  • He didn’t expect Cyrus to actually make him muffins and would have eaten whatver he got him
  • He hums the swing song to himself every now and then when he gets stressed
  • He thinks mainstream boybands are overrated
  • He owns a bajillion hoodies but almost never wears the hood part because it might mess up his hair

Ye these are really random and ones that just came to my head first so idk if theyre BEST but here’s some TJ headcanons
